fields.description:
Works fine with SDK: 3.0.GA or previous versions 3.0.1.v20130115150204

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create Default Project
2. Try running project in iOS simulator or iOS device.

Actual:
 "Unable to run command "build"" error appears [Refer Attachments]

Expected: Project must run successfully
fields.summary: iOS: Running default project in iOS simulator throws "Unable to run command "build"" error
fields.environment:
Mountain Lion 10.8.2
Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.2.201301181931
Titanium SDK Version: 3.0.2.v20130118180632, 3.0.2.v20130121140213

comments.body: The Titanium SDK you are using does not include the updated node-appc dependency. We updated things at the end of 1/21/2013. You must upgrade to Titanium SDK 3.0.2.v20130122123204 or newer to avoid this error.
